panels.content:
(your name) - UCS Traffic Monitoring - UCS Domain overview

Overview of the selected UCS Domain

targets.query: select sum(count) from (select count(distinct(chassis)) from (SELECT last("model") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade) group by domain)

select count(service_profile) AS "OK" from (SELECT last("model") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "oper_state" = 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade)

select count(service_profile) AS "Other" from (SELECT last("model") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "oper_state" != 'ok') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade)
select location from (select location,last(load) from FIEnvStats where ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/))
select sum(last) from (SELECT last("num_cpus") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade)
select sum(last) from (SELECT last("num_cores") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade)
select sum(last) from (SELECT last("num_vFCs") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade)
select sum(last) from (SELECT last("num_vEths") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade)
select sum(last) from (SELECT last("memory") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade)
select count(service_profile) from (SELECT last("model") FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY service_profile,domain,chassis,blade)

SELECT (last("total_memory") - last("mem_available"))/last("total_memory")*100 FROM "autogen"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" =~ /A/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("total_memory")  FROM "autogen"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" =~ /A/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT (last("total_memory") - last("mem_available"))/last("total_memory")*100 FROM "autogen"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" =~ /B/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("total_memory")  FROM "autogen"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" =~ /B/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("mem_available")  FROM "autogen"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" =~ /A/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("mem_available")  FROM "autogen"."FIEnvStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "fi_id" =~ /B/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

select count(last) from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' and "fi_id" =~ /A/) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)
select count(last) from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' and "fi_id" = 'B') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "UP" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'up' AND "fi_id" = 'A') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "Not UP" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" != 'up' AND "fi_id" = 'A') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "FC" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "transport" = 'FC' AND "fi_id" = 'A' ) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "Ethernet" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "transport" = 'Eth' AND "fi_id" = 'A' ) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "UP" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'up' AND "fi_id" = 'B') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "Not UP" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" != 'up' AND "fi_id" = 'B') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "FC" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "transport" = 'FC' AND "fi_id" = 'B' ) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "Ethernet" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "transport" = 'Eth' AND "fi_id" = 'B' ) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "1 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "fi_id" = 'A' AND "oper_speed" = 1) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "10 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "fi_id" = 'A' AND "oper_speed" = 10) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "40 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "fi_id" = 'A' AND "oper_speed" = 40) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "4G" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 4 AND "fi_id" = 'A' ) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "8G" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 8 AND "fi_id" = 'A' ) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "16G" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 16 AND "fi_id" = 'A' ) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "1 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "fi_id" = 'B' AND "oper_speed" = 1) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "10 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "fi_id" = 'B' AND "oper_speed" = 10) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "40 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "fi_id" = 'B' AND "oper_speed" = 40) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "4G" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 4 AND "fi_id" = 'B' ) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "8G" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 8 AND "fi_id" = 'B' ) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "16G" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIUplinkPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 16 AND "fi_id" = 'B' ) and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)
select count(last) from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND fi_id = 'A') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)
select count(last) from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND fi_id = 'B') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "UP" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'up' AND fi_id = 'A') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "Not UP" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" != 'up' AND fi_id = 'A') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "1 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 1 AND fi_id = 'A') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "10 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 10 AND fi_id = 'A') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "40 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 40 AND fi_id = 'A') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "UP" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" = 'up' AND fi_id = 'B') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "Not UP" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_state" != 'up' AND fi_id = 'B') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "1 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 1 AND fi_id = 'B') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "10 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 10 AND fi_id = 'B') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

select count(last) AS "40 Gbps" from (SELECT last("oper_state") FROM "autogen"."FIServerPortStats" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/ AND "channel" != '' AND "oper_speed" = 40 AND fi_id = 'B') and $timeFilter group by domain,fi_id,port)

styles.linkTooltip: Overview of all UCS domains in [[__cell]]

targets.query: SELECT location as "Location", domain as "Domain",  chassis as "Chassis ID", blade as "Blade", model as "Model", serial as "Serial", num_cpus as "# CPU", num_cores as "# Cores", memory as "Memory", operability as "Operability", oper_state as "Operational State", oper_state_code, num_vEths as "# vEth", num_vFCs as "# vFC" FROM "autogen"."BladeServers" WHERE ("domain" =~ /^$domain$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "service_profile",chassis,blade order by time desc limit 1

list.definition: show tag values from FIEnvStats with key=domain
list.label: UCS Domain
list.name: domain
list.query: show tag values from FIEnvStats with key=domain
